title: Can you identify this font?
content:
I'm looking for the font used for "UPON A TIME" in this logo. Can anyone identify it?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317160015im_/http:/typophile.com/files/tumblr_static_6cux5uvtg10kwcck0cgg0c0ok_6486.png)
author: TS23

comments.content: For the "UPON A TIME" portion of the logo.
Not in this forum; Typophile's rules don't allow it. Please repost in the [Type ID](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317160015/http:/www.typophile.com/typeid) forum.
